steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 9-2012. A 67-year-old 
man with a persistently elevated PSA level.
Kaufman DS(1), Zietman AL, McDougal WS, Dahl DM, Harisinghani MG, Wu CL.

Author information:
(1)Division of Hematology–Oncology, Department of Medicine, Massachusetts 
General Hospital, Boston, USA.
